verses.verse: At <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> they shall bring <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> out of their <S%H4480>graves:<s%> <S%H6913><s%>

And they shall <S%H7849>spread<s%> them before the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they have <S%H157>loved,<s%> and <S%H834>whom<s%> they have <S%H5647>served,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they have <S%H1980>walked,<s%> and <S%H834>whom<s%> they have <S%H1875>sought,<s%> and <S%H834>whom<s%> they have <S%H7812>worshiped:<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H622>gathered,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> be <S%H6912>buried;<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for <S%H1828>dung<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

And <S%H4194>death<s%> shall be <S%H977>chosen<s%> rather than <S%H4480>life<s%> <S%H2416><s%> by <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of them that <S%H7604>remain<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4940>family,<s%> which <S%H7604>remain<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Moreover thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> Shall they <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6965>arise?<s%> shall he turn <S%H7725>away,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>return?<s%>

Why <S%H4069><s%> then is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> slid <S%H7725>back<s%> by a <S%H5329>perpetual<s%> <S%H4878>backsliding?<s%> they hold <S%H2388>fast<s%> <S%H8649>deceit,<s%> they <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H7725>return.<s%>

I <S%H7181>hearkened<s%> and <S%H8085>heard,<s%> but they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3651>aright:<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> him <S%H5921>of<s%> his <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have I <S%H6213>done?<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> to his <S%H4794>course,<s%> as the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H7857>rusheth<s%> into the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

Yea, <S%H1571><s%> the <S%H2624>stork<s%> in the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> her appointed <S%H4150>times;<s%> and the <S%H8449>turtle<s%> and the <S%H5483>crane<s%> and the <S%H5693>swallow<s%> <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H935>coming;<s%> but my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

How <S%H349><s%> do ye <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H587>We<s%> are <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> us? <S%H2009>Lo,<s%> <S%H403>certainly<s%> in <S%H8267>vain<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he it; the <S%H5842>pen<s%> of the <S%H5608>scribes<s%> is in <S%H8267>vain.<s%>

The <S%H2450>wise<s%> men are <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> they are <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> and <S%H3920>taken:<s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> they have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is in them?

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H802>wives<s%> unto <S%H312>others,<s%> and their <S%H7704>fields<s%> to them that shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> from the <S%H4480>least<s%> <S%H6996><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> is given to <S%H1214>covetousness,<s%> <S%H1215><s%> from the <S%H4480>prophet<s%> <S%H5030><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H6213>dealeth<s%> <S%H8267>falsely.<s%>

For they have <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7667>hurt<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7043>slightly,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace,<s%> <S%H7965>peace;<s%> when there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

Were they <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they had <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination?<s%> <S%H1571>nay,<s%> they were <S%H3808>not<s%> at all <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H954><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3045>could<s%> they <S%H3637>blush:<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> shall they <S%H5307>fall<s%> among them that <S%H5307>fall:<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%> they shall be cast <S%H3782>down,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I will surely <S%H5486>consume<s%> <S%H5486><s%> them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> there shall be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%> on the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H8384>figs<s%> on the fig <S%H8384>tree,<s%> and the <S%H5929>leaf<s%> shall <S%H5034>fade;<s%> and the things that I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them shall pass <S%H5674>away<s%> from them.

Why <S%H4100><s%> <S%H5921><s%> do <S%H587>we<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> still? assemble <S%H622>yourselves,<s%> and let us <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4013>defensed<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and let us be <S%H1826>silent<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> hath put us to <S%H1826>silence,<s%> and given us <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H7219>gall<s%> to <S%H8248>drink,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
We <S%H6960>looked<s%> for <S%H7965>peace,<s%> but <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> came; and for a <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H4832>health,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H1205>trouble!<s%>

The <S%H5170>snorting<s%> of his <S%H5483>horses<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> from <S%H4480>Dan:<s%> <S%H1835><s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7493>trembled<s%> at the <S%H4480>sound<s%> <S%H6963><s%> of the <S%H4684>neighing<s%> of his strong <S%H47>ones;<s%> for they are <S%H935>come,<s%> and have <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> that is in it; the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and those that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H5175>serpents,<s%> <S%H6848>cockatrices,<s%> among you, <S%H834>which<s%> will <S%H369>not<s%> be <S%H3908>charmed,<s%> and they shall <S%H5391>bite<s%> you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
When I would <S%H4010>comfort<s%> myself <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3015>sorrow,<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H1742>faint<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> me.

Behold <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7775>cry<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> because of them that dwell in a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H4480>country:<s%> <S%H776><s%> Is <S%H369>not<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion?<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> her <S%H4428>king<s%> in her? <S%H4069>Why<s%> have they provoked me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their graven <S%H6456>images,<s%> and with <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H1892>vanities?<s%>
The <S%H7105>harvest<s%> is <S%H5674>past,<s%> the <S%H7019>summer<s%> is <S%H3615>ended,<s%> and <S%H587>we<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3467>saved.<s%>

For <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H7667>hurt<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> am I <S%H7665>hurt;<s%> I am <S%H6937>black;<s%> <S%H8047>astonishment<s%> hath taken <S%H2388>hold<s%> on me.

Is there <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6875>balm<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead;<s%> is there <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7495>physician<s%> <S%H8033>there?<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> <S%H3588>then<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H724>health<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5927>recovered?<s%>
